text: No complaint... is more common than that of a scarcity of money.
author: Adam Smith

text: Wealth flows from energy and ideas.
author: William Feather

text: I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is.
author: Paul Harvey

text: Many folks think they aren't good at earning money, when what they don't know is how to use it.
author: Frank A. Clark

text: There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson
